long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When my wife started learning Spanish, I was inspired to find simple and effective ways to support her progress. 

I created this extension because I believe immersion and vocabulary are two of the most important factors in language learning. I'll show you a new Spanish word daily as you check your email or browse the web. It'll effortlessly familiarize you with tons of words you can use in your regular Spanish practice. Along with the word, you'll get:

- Easy pronunciation guides (e.g. Poder - poh - dehr)
- Part of Speech (e.g. verb, noun, etc)
- A sample sentence with its translation

Thanks for letting me be part of your language-learning adventure!
